sql-query.name: QueryUserDoneList
sql-query.content: select task.taskinst_id id, procdef.type_id, procinst.title, procinst.start_user_id, task.name name, assignee.finish_time, task.state_ task_state, procinst.state_ procinst_state, task.business_id, task.page_id from (select distinct taskinst_id, finish_time from bpm_hi_assignee where user_id=#{userId} and handle_state = 6) assignee left join ( select procdef_id, procinst_id, taskinst_id, name, business_id, page_id, 'H' state_ from bpm_hi_task union select procdef_id, procinst_id, taskinst_id, name, business_id, page_id, 'R' state_ from bpm_ru_task ) task on (assignee.taskinst_id = task.taskinst_id) left join ( select procinst_id, title, start_user_id, state, 'H' state_ from bpm_hi_procinst union select procinst_id, title, start_user_id, state, 'R' state_ from bpm_ru_procinst ) procinst on (task.procinst_id = procinst.procinst_id) left join bpm_re_procdef procdef on (task.procdef_id = procdef.id) where procinst.state < 5
